item.title: My new and improved autotalker/ban your self fast
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

program bannerandautotyper;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\extended\xtext.scar}
 ///////////////////////////////////////
 //  By Bobby                         //
 //  V.1.0 Created it                 //
 //  V.2.0 Added colors and effects   //
 //  V.2.1 added randoms and loggin   //
 //  V.2.2 made it actually compile   //
 //  V.2.3 Made the Progress Report   //
 //  V.3.0 Made separate autotalking  //
 //        and banning functions      //
 //  {This script *WILL* ban you if   //
 //  used as a banning script, it     //
 //  shouldn't ban you if you are     //
 //  using it as an autotyper}        //
 //  Please use caution               //
 //  Set up is on lines 17-36 + 66-95 //
 //  Have fun being banned            //
 //  PLEASE don't leach my script     //
 //  Creds to: SRL devs, junkj for    //
 //  some help and myself  :)         //
 ///////////////////////////////////////

var
Howmany: integer;
typehumanlike: string;
const
//----Setup----//  Lines 17-25 are ban phrases//////////////////////////
type1= 'G00d m0rning, this is J@gex st@ff ple@se tell y0ur p@ssw0rd'; //
type2= 'J@gex is @ ret@rded fre@k';                                   //
type3= 'RuneSc@pe is the l@mest g@me ever!!M@cr0ing m@kes it fun!';   //
type4= 'I @ut0 @nd m@ke everything w0rthless h@h@ skillers';          //
type5= 'RuneSc@pe is the g3yest g@me ever in my life...';             //
type6= 'L00k, i @m m@cr0ing! I @m never g0nn@ ST0P!!!!!';             //
type7= 'g0 t0 F@gex.n3t f0r che@ts!!!';                               //
type8= 'I @m using @ b0t t0 @ut0 t@lk! I love making money so easily';//
type9= 'If y0u tell me y0ur p@ssw0rd, I will m@ke y0u @ member';      //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
howmanytimes= 100;//how many times you wanna do it
waittime1= 1000;//how much time in between saying ban phrases
waittime2=1000;// if using this as an autotalker, wait time
banorautotalker=1;//1 is to ban,2 is an autotalker
autotalkphrase1=(''); /////////////////////
autotalkphrase2=(''); // The Autotalking //
autotalkphrase3=(''); // Phrases         //
autotalkphrase4=(''); /////////////////////
//-End-Of-Setup-//
type20= 'red:';
type21= 'white:';
type22= 'green:';
type23= 'cyan:';
type24= 'purple:';
type25= 'flash1:';
type26= 'flash2:';
type27= 'flash3:';
type28= 'glow1:';
type29= 'glow2:';
type30= 'glow3:';
//\\//\\//\\//\\
type40= 'scroll';
type41= 'shake';
type42= 'slide';
type43= 'wave';
type44= 'wave2';

procedure thankyou;
Begin
Writeln ('Thank you for using my script')
end;

procedure hatetheban;
Begin
findnormalrandoms;
end;


Procedure DeclarePlayers;
 Begin

    HowManyPlayers := 1;
    NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
    CurrentPlayer :=0;

    Players[0].Name :='' ;
    Players[0].Pass :='' ;
    Players[0].Nick :='' ;
    Players[0].Loc := '';
    Players[0].Skill := 'RuneCrafting';
    Players[0].Active:= True;
end;

procedure talkban;    //Here edit in what lines you want to use. For
begin                 //instance, if you are using this script as an
if (banorautotalker=1) then
loginplayer;
wait(3000)
sendmytext(type1)     //autotyper, you don't want it do use type1 through
wait(waittime1);      //type9. This would cause the script to say the ban
sendmytext(type2)     //phrases. So, you would delete lines 66-83 and
wait(waittime1);      //leave 84-96 so the script would still work. And
sendmytext(type3)     //vise versa.
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type4)     //Remember, if you want to add color, use the
wait(waittime1);      //appropriate ones on lines 41-57. Coloring goes
sendmytext(type5)     //first, then the movable affect. For instance, use
wait(waittime1);      // 1.sendmytext (type23) //the color cyan
sendmytext(type6)     // 2.sendmytext (type1)  // a phrase to ban you
wait(waittime1);      // 3.wait (waittime1);   // how long you want to wait
sendmytext(type7)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type8)
wait(waittime1);
howmany:= howmanytimes+1
end;

Procedure autotalker;
begin
if (banorautotalker=2) then
begin
typesend(autotalkphrase1);
wait(waittime2);
typesend(autotalkphrase2);
wait(waittime2);
typesend(autotalkphrase3);
wait(waittime2);
typesend(autotalkphrase4);
wait(waittime2);
howmany:= howmanytimes+1
end;
end;

Procedure ProgressReport;
Begin
writeln ('Thanks for using my scripts')
writeln ('.______     ______   .______   .______   ____    ____ ')
writeln ('|   _  \   /  __  \  |   _  \  |   _  \  \   \  /   / ')
writeln ('|  |_)  | |  |  |  | |  |_)  | |  |_)  |  \   \/   /  ')
writeln ('|   _  <  |  |  |  | |   _  <  |   _  <    \_    _/   ')
writeln ('|  |_)  | |  `--/  | |  |_)  | |  |_)  |     |  |     ')
writeln ('|______/   \______/  |______/  |______/      |__|     ')
end;

procedure sayingthankyou;
begin
openwebpage('http://www.elite.net/~runner/jennifers/thankyou.htm')
end;

begin
setupsrl;
activateclient;
repeat;
talkban;
until (howmany=howmanytimes)
end.

i got a question…
can you leave the stuff alone when you copy and paste?because i have to keep fixing the same errors(just saying, not to offend you)

there cant be 2 untils

not the until(something) or
blah blah

thats just gonna compile wrong.

and to howmanytimes1 and b…hmmm that went with the untils right?
Well there gonna have to look at the setup because its gonna be the same thing no need for
the to howmnay times,because you need 2 variables

for the loggin thing… syntac errors for the user, pass nic and loc and stuff…
it needs 2 " ’ " between the “=” and “;”

a end; after the declar player procedure, some mispelled words…

duplicate identifer for the antiban procedure. antiban is a include for srl.

you can put a srl inlcude as a procedure name can ya?nope!
nor words like…

bad

procedure findnormalrandoms;
begin
findnormalrandoms;
end;

See How the srl line is the same as the procedure name? thats another error as a duplicate identifier.

good

procedure findtherandoms;
begin
findnormalrandoms;
end;

so always look out for them errors!

Thats all i can find…
Glad i can help for the…1st,…2nd,…3rd… 3rd time!
No problem pm if ya need anymore help.

Read full topic
item.source: My new and improved autotalker/ban your self fast

item.title: My new and improved autotalker/ban your self fast
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

Thanky you for all you help. sorry I can’t rep you.

I have the next version !!! for help pl0x

here it is [code]program bannerandautotyper;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\extended\xtext.scar}
///////////////////////////////////////
// By Bobby //
// V.1.0 Created it //
// V.2.0 Added colors and effects //
// V.2.1 added randoms and loggin //
// V.2.2 made it actually compile //
// V.2.3 Made the Progress Report //
// V.3.0 Made separate autotalking //
// and banning functions //
// {This script WILL ban you if //
// used as a banning script, it //
// shouldn’t ban you if you are //
// using it as an autotyper} //
// Please use caution //
// Set up is on lines 17-36 + 66-95 //
// Have fun being banned //
// PLEASE don’t leach my script //
// Creds to: SRL devs, junkj for //
// some help and myself //
///////////////////////////////////////

var
Hoymany: integer;
typehumanlike: string;
const
//----Setup----// Lines 17-25 are ban phrases//////////////////////////
type1= ‘G00d m0rning, this is J@gex st@ff ple@se tell y0ur p@ssw0rd’; //
type2= ‘J@gex is @ ret@rded fre@k’; //
type3= ‘RuneSc@pe is the l@mest g@me ever!!M@cr0ing m@kes it fun!’; //
type4= ‘I @ut0 @nd m@ke everything w0rthless h@h@ skillers’; //
type5= ‘RuneSc@pe is the g3yest g@me ever in my life…’; //
type6= ‘L00k, i @m m@cr0ing! I @m never g0nn@ ST0P!!!’; //
type7= ‘g0 t0 F@gex.n3t f0r che@ts!!!’; //
type8= ‘I @m using @ b0t t0 @ut0 t@lk! I love making money so easily’;//
type9= ‘If y0u tell me y0ur p@ssw0rd, I will m@ke y0u @ member’; //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
howmanytimesB= 100;//This=# times Ban Phrase is said
howmanytimesA= 100;//this=# times autotalker goes
waittime1= 1000;//how much time in between saying ban phrases
waittime2=1000;// if using this as an autotalker, wait time
banorautotalker=1;//1 is to ban,2 is an autotalker
autotalkphrase1=(’’); /////////////////////
autotalkphrase2=(’’); // The Autotalking //
autotalkphrase3=(’’); // Phrases //
autotalkphrase4=(’’); /////////////////////
//-End-Of-Setup-//
type20= ‘red:’;
type21= ‘white:’;
type22= ‘green:’;
type23= ‘cyan:’;
type24= ‘purple:’;
type25= ‘flash1:’;
type26= ‘flash2:’;
type27= ‘flash3:’;
type28= ‘glow1:’;
type29= ‘glow2:’;
type30= ‘glow3:’;
//\//\//\//\
type40= ‘scroll’;
type41= ‘shake’;
type42= ‘slide’;
type43= ‘wave’;
type44= ‘wave2’;

procedure thankyou;
Begin
Writeln (‘Thank you for using my script’)
end;

procedure antiban;
Begin
findnormalrandoms;
end;

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
Begin

HowManyPlayers := 1;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer :=0;

Players[0].Name := ;
Players[0].Pass := ;
Players[0].Nick := ;
Players[0].Loc := '';
Players[0].Skill := 'RuneCrafting';
Players[0].Active:= True;

procedure talkban; //Here edit in what lines you want to use. For
begin //instance, if you are using this script as an
if (banorautotalker=1) then
loginplayer;
wait(3000)
sendmytext(type1) //autotyper, you don’t want it do use type1 through
wait(waittime1); //type9. This would cause the script to say the ban
sendmytext(type2) //phrases. So, you would delete lines 66-83 and
wait(waittime1); //leave 84-96 so the script would still work. And
sendmytext(type3) //vise versa.
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type4) //Remember, if you want to add color, use the
wait(waittime1); //appropriate ones on lines 41-57. Coloring goes
sendmytext(type5) //first, then the movable affect. For instance, use
wait(waittime1); // 1.sendmytext (type23) //the color cyan
sendmytext(type6) // 2.sendmytext (type1) // a phrase to ban you
wait(waittime1); // 3.wait (waittime1); // how long you want to wait
sendmytext(type7)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type8)
wait(waittime1);
howmanyB:= howmanytimesB+1
end;

Procedure autotalker
Begin
if (banorautotalker=2) then
typesend(autotalkphrase1);
wait(waittime2);
typesend(autotalkphrase2);
wait(waittime2);
typesend(autotalkphrase3);
wait(waittime2);
typesend(autotalkphrase4);
wait(waittime2);
howmanyA:= howmanytimesA=1
end

Procedure IQcheck;
if (banorautotalker=else) then
writeln(‘What are you smoking? Pick to autotalk or ban’)
terminatescript;
end;

Procedure ProgressReport;
Begin
writeln (‘Thanks for using my scripts’)
writeln (’.______ ______ .______ .______ ____ ____ ‘)
writeln (’| _ \ / __ \ | _ \ | _ \ \ \ / / ‘)
writeln (’| |) | | | | | | |) | | |) | \ / / ‘)
writeln (’| _ < | | | | | _ < | _ < _ / ‘)
writeln (’| |) | | `–/ | | |) | | |) | | | ‘)
writeln (’|/ _/ |______/ |____/ || ')
end;

procedure sayingthankyou
openwebpage(‘http://www.elite.net/~runner/jennifers/thankyou.htm’)

begin
setupsrl;
activateclient;
repeat;
talkban;
until (homanytimesB=howmanytimesB); or
(howmanytimesA=homanytimesA)
end.[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 11:38:34 AM[/size][hr]Anymore commets?

Read full topic

item.title: My new and improved autotalker/ban your self fast
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

program bannerandautotyper;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\extended\xtext.scar}
 ///////////////////////////////////////
 //  By Bobby                         //
 //  V.1.0 Made it                    //
 //  V.2.0 Added colors and effects   //
 //  V.2.1 added randoms and loggin   //
 //  V.2.2 made it actually compile   //
 //  V.2.3 Made the Progress Report   //
 //  {This script *WILL* ban you if   //
 //  used as a banning script, it     //
 //  shouldn't ban you if you are     //
 //  using it as an autotyper}        //
 //  Please use caution               //
 //  Set up is on lines 17-36 + 66-95 //
 //  Have fun being banned            //
 //  PLEASE don't leach my script     //
 ///////////////////////////////////////

var
Howmany: integer;
typehumanlike: string;
const
//----Setup----//  Lines 26-34 are ban phrases//////////////////////////
type1= 'G00d m0rning, this is J@gex st@ff ple@se tell y0ur p@ssw0rd'; //
type2= 'J@gex is @ ret@rded fre@k';                                   //
type3= 'RuneSc@pe is the l@mest g@me ever!!M@cr0ing m@kes it fun!';   //
type4= 'I @ut0 @nd m@ke everything w0rthless h@h@ skillers';          //
type5= 'RuneSc@pe is the g3yest g@me ever in my life...';             //
type6= 'L00k, i @m m@cr0ing! I @m never g0nn@ ST0P!!!!!';             //
type7= 'g0 t0 F@gex.n3t f0r che@ts!!!';                               //
type8= 'I @m using @ b0t t0 @ut0 t@lk! I love making money so easily';//
type9= 'If y0u tell me y0ur p@ssw0rd, I will m@ke y0u @ member';      //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
type10= '';//                                                      //
type11= '';//                                                      //
type12= '';//                                                      //
type13= '';//                                                      //
type14= '';//                                                      //
type15= '';//                                                      //
 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
howmanytimes= 100;//how manny times do u wanna say it?
waittime1= 1000;//how much time in between saying ban phrases
waittime2=1000;// if using this as an autotalker, wait time
banorautotalker=1;//1 for ban talking,2 for autotyper
saywhat=('');// what do you want the autotalker to say
//-End-Of-Setup-//
type20= 'red:';
type21= 'white:';
type22= 'green:';
type23= 'cyan:';
type24= 'purple:';
type25= 'flash1:';
type26= 'flash2:';
type27= 'flash3:';
type28= 'glow1:';
type29= 'glow2:';
type30= 'glow3:';
//\\//\\//\\//\\
type40= 'scroll:';
type41= 'shake:';
type42= 'slide:';
type43= 'wave:';
type44= 'wave2:';

procedure thankyou;
Begin
Writeln ('Thank you for using my script')
end;

procedure dontbanme;
Begin
findnormalrandoms;
end;


Procedure DeclarePlayers;
 Begin

    HowManyPlayers := 1;
    NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
    CurrentPlayer := 0;
    
    Players[0].Name :='';
    Players[0].Pass :='';
    Players[0].Nick :='';
    Players[0].Loc := '';
    Players[0].Active := True;
end;
    
procedure talkban;    //Here edit in what lines you want to use. For
begin                 //instance, if you are using this script as an
if (banorautotalker=1) then
loginplayer;
wait(3000)
sendmytext(type1)     //autotyper, you don't want it do use type1 through
wait(waittime1);      //type9. This would cause the script to say the ban
sendmytext(type2)     //phrases. So, you would delete lines 66-83 and
wait(waittime1);      //leave 84-96 so the script would still work. And
sendmytext(type3)     //vise versa.
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type4)     //Remember, if you want to add color, use the
wait(waittime1);      //appropriate ones on lines 41-57. Coloring goes
sendmytext(type5)     //first, then the movable affect. For instance, use
wait(waittime1);      // 1.sendmytext (type23) //the color cyan
sendmytext(type6)     // 2.sendmytext (type1)  // a phrase to ban you
wait(waittime1);      // 3.wait (waittime1);   // how long you want to wait
sendmytext(type7)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type8)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type9)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type10)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type11)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type12)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type13)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type14)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type15)
wait(waittime2);
howmany:= howmanytimes+1
end;

procedure autotalker;
begin
if (banorautotalker=2) then
typesend(saywhat)
end;

Procedure ProgressReport;
Begin
writeln ('Thanks for using my scripts')
writeln ('.______     ______   .______   .______   ____    ____ ')
writeln ('|   _  \   /  __  \  |   _  \  |   _  \  \   \  /   / ')
writeln ('|  |_)  | |  |  |  | |  |_)  | |  |_)  |  \   \/   /  ')
writeln ('|   _  <  |  |  |  | |   _  <  |   _  <    \_    _/   ')
writeln ('|  |_)  | |  `--/  | |  |_)  | |  |_)  |     |  |     ')
writeln ('|______/   \______/  |______/  |______/      |__|     ')
end;

begin
setupsrl;
activateclient;
repeat;
talkban;
until(howmany = howmanytimes)
end.

only did that autotalker or ban thing.
To do that its like a drop procedure ill use mine as a example,

                           {setup the setup}
Program boringdropper;
{.include srl/srl.scar.}
{.include srl/srl/skill/Woodcutting.scar}


const
axe=2; //1=equiped,2=inventory
logstodo=1;  //dont touch this

var
log: integer;

procedure drop;
begin
if(axe=1)then
 begin
  dropall;
  log:= logstodo+1
 end;
end;

procedure drop2;
begin
if(axe=2)then
 Begin
  Dropto(2,28)
 log:= logstodo+1
 end;
end;

As you can see i have in my const axe1, or axe2
now look at my procedures,

procedure drop;
begin
if(axe=1)then
 begin
  dropall;
  log:= logstodo+1
 end;
end;

procedure drop2;
begin
if(axe=2)then
 Begin
  Dropto(2,28)
 log:= logstodo+1
 end;
end;

It says if (axe-1) then or if (axe=2) then

but look at the const at the axe thing

axe=2; //1=equiped,2=inventory

if axe=1 its weilded, if axe=2 its in your first invintory slot lets look back at the procedures now,

procedure drop;
begin
if(axe=1)then
 begin
  dropall;
  log:= logstodo+1
 end;
end;

procedure drop2;
begin
if(axe=2)then
 Begin
  Dropto(2,28)
 log:= logstodo+1
 end;
end;

The first procedure says that if the axe is one and your weilding it it will drop all of the logs.
The second one says that if the axe is 2 ,in the first inventory slot, it will drop from the 2 slot-last one.

I hope i didnt give you a complicated time reading this but it should help.
Glad i can help!

Read full topic

item.title: My new and improved autotalker/ban your self fast
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

Thank you for your help. so very much. i added many changes, and here it is:

also, can someone helpme make it so a a color type20-30 then an effect type40-44 then a random ban phrase type1-9 will appear? I want it to be random

lastly, I want to make it so you eithere pick autotype or ban and you don’t have to edit the script around a whole lot.

creds in next release

[code]program bannerandautotyper;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\extended\xtext.scar}
///////////////////////////////////////
// By Bobby //
// V.1.0 Made it //
// V.2.0 Added colors and effects //
// V.2.1 added randoms and loggin //
// V.2.2 made it actually compile //
// V.2.3 Made the Progress Report //
// {This script WILL ban you if //
// used as a banning script, it //
// shouldn’t ban you if you are //
// using it as an autotyper} //
// Please use caution //
// Set up is on lines 17-36 + 66-95 //
// Have fun being banned //
// PLEASE don’t leach my script //
///////////////////////////////////////

var
Hoymany: integer;
typehumanlike: string;
const
//----Setup----// Lines 17-25 are ban phrases//////////////////////////
type1= ‘G00d m0rning, this is J@gex st@ff ple@se tell y0ur p@ssw0rd’; //
type2= ‘J@gex is @ ret@rded fre@k’; //
type3= ‘RuneSc@pe is the l@mest g@me ever!!M@cr0ing m@kes it fun!’; //
type4= ‘I @ut0 @nd m@ke everything w0rthless h@h@ skillers’; //
type5= ‘RuneSc@pe is the g3yest g@me ever in my life…’; //
type6= ‘L00k, i @m m@cr0ing! I @m never g0nn@ ST0P!!!’; //
type7= ‘g0 t0 F@gex.n3t f0r che@ts!!!’; //
type8= ‘I @m using @ b0t t0 @ut0 t@lk! I love making money so easily’;//
type9= ‘If y0u tell me y0ur p@ssw0rd, I will m@ke y0u @ member’; //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
type10= ‘’;// USE LINES 27-32 AS AN AUTOTALKER //
type11= ‘’;// //
type12= ‘’;// //
type13= ‘’;// //
type14= ‘’;// //
type15= ‘’;// //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
howmanytimes= 100;//how manny times do u wanna say it?
waittime1= 1000;//how much time in between saying ban phrases
waittime2=1000;// if using this as an autotalker, wait time
//-End-Of-Setup-//
type20= ‘red:’;
type21= ‘white:’;
type22= ‘green:’;
type23= ‘cyan:’;
type24= ‘purple:’;
type25= ‘flash1:’;
type26= ‘flash2:’;
type27= ‘flash3:’;
type28= ‘glow1:’;
type29= ‘glow2:’;
type30= ‘glow3:’;
//\//\//\//\
type40= ‘scroll’;
type41= ‘shake’;
type42= ‘slide’;
type43= ‘wave’;
type44= ‘wave2’;

procedure thankyou;
Begin
Writeln (‘Thank you for using my script’)
end;

procedure antiban;
Begin
findnormalrandoms;
findrandoms;
end;

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
Begin

HowManyPlayers := 1;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);

Players[0].Name := ;
Players[0].Pass := ;
Players[0].Nick := ;
Players[0].Loc := '';
Players[0].Skill := 'RuneCrafting';

procedure talkban; //Here edit in what lines you want to use. For
begin //instance, if you are using this script as an
loginplayer;
wait(3000)
sendmytext(type1) //autotyper, you don’t want it do use type1 through
wait(waittime1); //type9. This would cause the script to say the ban
sendmytext(type2) //phrases. So, you would delete lines 66-83 and
wait(waittime1); //leave 84-96 so the script would still work. And
sendmytext(type3) //vise versa.
wait(waittime);
sendmytext(type4) //Remember, if you want to add color, use the
wait(waittime1); //appropriate ones on lines 41-57. Coloring goes
sendmytext(type5) //first, then the movable affect. For instance, use
wait(waittime1); // 1.sendmytext (type23) //the color cyan
sendmytext(type6) // 2.sendmytext (type1) // a phrase to ban you
wait(waittime1); // 3.wait (waittime1); // how long you want to wait
sendmytext(type7)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type8)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type9)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type10)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type11)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type12)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type13)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type14)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type15)
wait(waittime2);
homany:= homanytimes+1
end;

Procedure ProgressReport;
Begin
writeln (‘Thanks for using my scripts’)
writeln (’.______ ______ .______ .______ ____ ____ ‘)
writeln (’| _ \ / __ \ | _ \ | _ \ \ \ / / ‘)
writeln (’| |) | | | | | | |) | | |) | \ / / ‘)
writeln (’| _ < | | | | | _ < | _ < _ / ‘)
writeln (’| |) | | `–/ | | |) | | |) | | | ‘)
writeln (’|/ _/ |______/ |____/ || ')
end;

begin
setupsrl;
activateclient;
repeat;
talkban;
until (homanytimes=howmanytimes);
end.[/code]

item.title: My new and improved autotalker/ban your self fast
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

First of all…Dont put “go to moparisthebest for cheats” mads and jagex could be watching…
Nor scar2.03…
For the login player put it after the begin in the banning procedure.Take it out of the var.

Findnormalrandoms… hmmm for a procedure dont put the same name as the srl line e.x.

procedure findnormalrandoms;
findnormalrandoms;

Or it compile bad.
That goes for the find randoms too.Put it someone in that ban procedure.

Again for the send my text…

For them vars i fixed them, kinda complicated

At the end of the banning thing put the
var thing:= const of howmanytimes+1

So it already did it 1 time.

Thats all i can find.
Glad i can help, heres the script.

program bannerandautotyper;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\extended\xtext.scar}
 ///////////////////////////////////////
 //  By Bobby                         //
 //  V.1.0 Made it                    //
 //  V.2.0 Added colors and effects   //
 //  V.2.1 added randoms and loggin   //
 //  V.2.2 made it actually compile   //
 //  V.2.3 Made the Progress Report   //
 //  {This script *WILL* ban you if   //
 //  used as a banning script, it     //
 //  shouldn't ban you if you are     //
 //  using it as an autotyper}        //
 //  Please use caution               //
 //  Set up is on lines 17-36 + 66-95 //
 //  Have fun being banned            //
 //  PLEASE don't leach my script     //
 ///////////////////////////////////////

var
howmany :integer;
typehumanlike: string;
const
//----Setup----//  Lines 17-25 are ban phrases//////////////////////////
type1= 'G00d m0rning, this is J@gex st@ff ple@se tell y0ur p@ssw0rd'; //
type2= 'J@gex is @ ret@rded fre@k';                                   //
type3= 'RuneSc@pe is the l@mest g@me ever!!M@cr0ing m@kes it fun!';   //
type4= 'I @ut0 @nd m@ke everything w0rthless h@h@ skillers';          //
type5= 'RuneSc@pe is the g3yest g@me ever in my life...';             //
type6= 'L00k, i @m m@cr0ing! I @m never g0nn@ ST0P!!!!!';             //
type7= 'g0 t0 m0p@ristheb3st.30m f0r che@ts!!!';                      //
type8= 'I @m using @ b0t c@lled Sc@r 2.03 t0 @ut0 t@lk!';             //
type9= 'If y0u tell me y0ur p@ssw0rd, I will m@ke y0u @ member';      //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
type10= '';//  ***USE LINES 27-32 AS AN AUTOTALKER***              //
type11= '';//                                                      //
type12= '';//                                                      //
type13= '';//                                                      //
type14= '';//                                                      //
type15= '';//                                                      //
 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
howmanytimes= 100;//how manny times do u wanna say it?
waittime1= 1000;//how much time in between saying ban phrases
waittime2=1000;// if using this as an autotalker, wait time
//-End-Of-Setup-//
type20= 'red:';
type21= 'white:';
type22= 'green:';
type23= 'cyan:';
type24= 'purple:';
type25= 'flash1:';
type26= 'flash2:';
type27= 'flash3:';
type28= 'glow1:';
type29= 'glow2:';
type30= 'glow3:';
//\\//\\//\\//\\
type40= 'scroll';
type41= 'shake';
type42= 'slide';
type43= 'wave';
type44= 'wave2';

procedure thankyou;
Begin
Writeln ('Thank you for using my script')
end;

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
 Begin

    HowManyPlayers := 2;
    NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);

    Players[0].Name :='';
    Players[0].Pass :='';
    Players[0].Nick :='';
    Players[0].Loc := '';


    Players[1].Name :='';
    Players[1].Pass :='';
    Players[1].Nick :='';
    Players[1].Loc := '';
end;



procedure talkban;
begin                 //Here edit in what lines you want to use. For
loginplayer;          //instance, if you are using this script as an
sendmytext(type1)     //autotyper, you don't want it do use type1 through
wait(waittime1);      //type9. This would cause the script to say the ban
sendmytext(type2)     //phrases. So, you would delete lines 66-83 and
wait(waittime1);      //leave 84-96 so the script would still work. And
sendmytext(type3)     //vise versa.
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type4)     //Remember, if you want to add color, use the
wait(waittime1);      //appropriate ones on lines 41-57. Coloring goes
sendmytext(type5)     //first, then the movable affect. For instance, use
wait(waittime1);      // 1.sendmytext (type23) //the color cyan
sendmytext(type6)     // 2.sendmytext (type1)  // a phrase to ban you
wait(waittime1);      // 3.wait (waittime1);   // how long you want to wait
sendmytext(type7)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type8)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type9)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type10)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type11)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type12)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type13)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type14)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type15)
wait(waittime2);
howmany:= howmanytimes+1
end;

Procedure ProgressReport;
Begin
writeln ('Thanks for using my scripts')
writeln ('.______     ______   .______   .______   ____    ____ ')
writeln ('|   _  \   /  __  \  |   _  \  |   _  \  \   \  /   / ')
writeln ('|  |_)  | |  |  |  | |  |_)  | |  |_)  |  \   \/   /  ')
writeln ('|   _  <  |  |  |  | |   _  <  |   _  <    \_    _/   ')
writeln ('|  |_)  | |  `--/  | |  |_)  | |  |_)  |     |  |     ')
writeln ('|______/   \______/  |______/  |______/      |__|     ')
end;

begin
setupsrl;
activateclient;
repeat;
talkban;
until(howmanytimes=howmanytimes)
end.

oops.
here is the newst version:

var t: integer; players, typehumanlike: string;
const
//----Setup----// Lines 17-25 are ban phrases//////////////////////////
type1= ‘G00d m0rning, this is J@gex st@ff ple@se tell y0ur p@ssw0rd’; //
type2= ‘J@gex is @ ret@rded fre@k’; //
type3= ‘RuneSc@pe is the l@mest g@me ever!!M@cr0ing m@kes it fun!’; //
type4= ‘I @ut0 @nd m@ke everything w0rthless h@h@ skillers’; //
type5= ‘RuneSc@pe is the g3yest g@me ever in my life…’; //
type6= ‘L00k, i @m m@cr0ing! I @m never g0nn@ ST0P!!!’; //
type7= ‘g0 t0 m0p@ristheb3st.30m f0r che@ts!!!’; //
type8= ‘I @m using @ b0t c@lled Sc@r 2.03 t0 @ut0 t@lk!’; //
type9= ‘If y0u tell me y0ur p@ssw0rd, I will m@ke y0u @ member’; //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
type10= ‘’;// USE LINES 27-32 AS AN AUTOTALKER //
type11= ‘’;// //
type12= ‘’;// //
type13= ‘’;// //
type14= ‘’;// //
type15= ‘’;// //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
howmanytimes= 100;//how manny times do u wanna say it?
waittime1= 1000;//how much time in between saying ban phrases
waittime2=1000;// if using this as an autotalker, wait time
//-End-Of-Setup-//
type20= ‘red:’;
type21= ‘white:’;
type22= ‘green:’;
type23= ‘cyan:’;
type24= ‘purple:’;
type25= ‘flash1:’;
type26= ‘flash2:’;
type27= ‘flash3:’;
type28= ‘glow1:’;
type29= ‘glow2:’;
type30= ‘glow3:’;
//\//\//\//\
type40= ‘scroll’;
type41= ‘shake’;
type42= ‘slide’;
type43= ‘wave’;
type44= ‘wave2’;

procedure thankyou;
Begin
Writeln (‘Thank you for using my script’)
end;

procedure findnormalrandoms;
Begin
findnormalrandoms;
end;

procedure findrandoms;
begin
findrandoms;
end;

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
Begin

HowManyPlayers := 2;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);

Players[0].Name := ;
Players[0].Pass := ;
Players[0].Nick := ;
Players[0].Loc := '';
Players[0].Skill := 'RuneCrafting';


Players[1].Name := ;
Players[1].Pass := ;
Players[1].Nick := ;
Players[1].Loc := '';
Players[1].Skill := 'RuneCrafting';

procedure login;
begin
loginplayer;
end;

procedure sendmytext; //Here edit in what lines you want to use. For
begin //instance, if you are using this script as an
sendmytext(type1) //autotyper, you don’t want it do use type1 through
wait(waittime1); //type9. This would cause the script to say the ban
sendmytext(type2) //phrases. So, you would delete lines 66-83 and
wait(waittime1); //leave 84-96 so the script would still work. And
sendmytext(type3) //vise versa.
wait(waittime);
sendmytext(type4) //Remember, if you want to add color, use the
wait(waittime1); //appropriate ones on lines 41-57. Coloring goes
sendmytext(type5) //first, then the movable affect. For instance, use
wait(waittime1); // 66. sendmytext (type23) //the color cyan
sendmytext(type6) // 67. sendmytext (type1) // a phrase to ban you
wait(waittime1); // 68. wait (waittime1);
sendmytext(type7)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type8)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type9)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type10)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type11)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type12)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type13)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type14)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type15)
wait(waittime2);
end;

begin
setupsrl;
activateclient;
repeat;
autotalk;
t:=t+1
until (t=howmanytimes);
writeln (‘Have fun being banned,or using my autotalker- Bobby’)
end.[/code]

item.title: My new and improved autotalker/ban your self fast
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[size=20pt]Please comment if you read this!!! I don’t care what you say, just post something that has something to do with this !!! i don’t care if say “n00b Script0r”, just say what is wrong in addition to the pointless insult
*** version 3 is uploaded onto this post on 12/28/06[/size]
The scar tags don’t work, so here is my autotalker/ban yourself fast.

Please leave comments to help me improve this.

[code]program Get banned fast;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\extended\xtext.scar}
///////////////////////////////////////
// By Bobby //
// V.1 //
// This scrit WILL ban you!! //
// Please use caution //
// //
// Have fun //
// Please don’t leach my script //
///////////////////////////////////////

var t: integer, typehumanlike: string;
const
//----Setup----// Lines 17-25 are ban phrases
type1= ‘Good morning, this is J@gex staff please tell your p@ssw0rd’;
type2= ‘Jagex is a retarded freak’;
type3= ‘RuneScape is the lamest game ever!!Macroing makes it fun!’;
type4= ‘I auto and make everything worthless haha skillers’;
type5= ‘RuneScape is the g3yest game ever in my life…’;
type6= ‘Look, i am macroing! I am never gonna STOP!!!’;
type7= ‘go to moparisthebest.com for cheats!!!’;
type8= ‘I am using a bot called Scar 2.03 to auto talk!’;
type9= ‘If you tell me your password, I will make you a member’;
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
type10= ‘’;// USE LINES 27-32 aAS @AaN aAUTOTALKER
type11= ‘’;//
type12= ‘’;//
type13= ‘’;//
type14= ‘’;//
type15= ‘’;//
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
howmanytimes= 100;//how manny times do u wanna say it?
waittime1= 1000;//how much time in between saying ban phrases
waittime2=1000:// if using this as an autotalker, wait time
//-End-Of-Setup-//

procedure autotalk;
begin
sendmytext(type1)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type2)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type3)
wait(waittime);
sendmytext(type4)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type5)
wait(waittime1)
;sendmytext(type6)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type7)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type8)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type9)
wait(waittime1);
sendmytext(type10)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type11)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type12)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type13)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type14)
wait(waittime2);
sendmytext(type15)
wait(waittime2);
end;

begin
setupsrl;
activateclient;
repeat;
autotalk;
t:=t+1
until (t=howmanytimes);
writeln (‘Have fun being banned- Bobby’)
end.[/code]

version.2 is out. so soon
Can someoen help me make an auth system to?
and also help me make it so the colors and effects occur randomly.
and test the script

[code] program banner&autotyper;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\extended\xtext.scar}
///////////////////////////////////////
// By Bobby //
// V.2 //
// {This script WILL ban you if //

sendmytext(type5) //first, then the movable affect. For instance, use
